name: 77's Creations
description:
WARNING!

This game isn't intended to be horror, but there are flashing lights and cartoonish grim imagery. If any of this may be harmful to you, please refrain from playing or proceed with caution.

_____

ProCo assembles happiness for children and adults alike. It's the source of your everyday ease, the company that keeps making so you don't have to.

But as a worker, things are very different.

_____

Another school project, but this time with the space to do anything my friend and I wanted! 77's Creations is a short game with a specific message, but hopefully whoever plays it can find enjoyment regardless.

Please Note

When downloaded, the file should be called "Allegory".  The game has not yet been tested on Mac.

If there are any typos or bugs, please inform me so they can be fixed!

Psst, listen to the soundtrack below!

77s Creations OST
